Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 51st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2011...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Chicago (N) on 2/12/2011 (Going to CHN: 1B A. Dickerson. Going to CHA: P E. Blessing)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Toronto on 2/12/2011 (Going to CHN: P M. Pineda. Going to TOR: 1B A. Dickerson, P R. Detwiler, CF D. Stickell)...
Traded from Toronto to Los Angeles (A) on 2/12/2011 (Going to TOR: P A. Meyer. Going to LAA: 1B A. Dickerson, P T. Tucker)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to New York (A) on 5/15/2011 (Going to NYA: CF B. Goodwin, 1B A. Dickerson, P A. Pacheco. Going to LAA: DH M. Jacobs)...
Had first career hit on 9/6/2016, off Andrew Brown (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/12/2017, off Matt Garza (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/9/2018, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2018, hitting .291 with 17 HR, 74 RBI...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 6/16/2019 (Going to NYA: P D. Holland. Going to CHA: 1B A. Dickerson)...
